question.title: WSO2 Micro integrator(MI) - Sentry implementation
question.body:
I'm trying to get Sentry to work with WSO2 Micro Integrator 4.4.0, but it seems to be an incredibly difficult task. Has anyone here managed to get it running?

If you have, I would be very grateful if you could share a brief explanation of how you accomplished this impressive feat.

I'm having trouble editing my log4j2.properties file. I've tried multiple versions of the sentry-log4j2 and sentry.io libraries, but I still can't get it to work.

I'm consistently getting the following errors:

  • org.ops4j.pax.logging.pax-logging-api [log4j2] ERROR: Unable to locate plugin type for Sentry
  • org.ops4j.pax.logging.pax-logging-api [log4j2] ERROR: Unable to locate plugin for Sentry

question_comments.body: Never seen or worked with MI before, but according to their docs and sentry docs, this integration is not supported. But MI does support OTLP, and there is a beta for sentry to work with that protocol, but it seems very limited right now. I've tried to do a quick setup but it's just too much work for a question
Please clarify your specific problem or provide additional details to highlight exactly what you need. As it's currently written, it's hard to tell exactly what you're asking.
